com.phunware.alerts.models

Class PwSubscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.alerts.models.PwSubscription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class PwSubscription
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Object model to hold data for a subscription.

    Get a list of subscriptions from the server using PwAlertsSubscriptions.getSubscriptionGroups(Context context). This will return an array list of Subscription objects. Each subscription will have a populated id and name field however the isSubscribed flag will be false.

    The server maintains a subscription state however that state is not sent back in that call. It is up to the developer to maintain state of subscribed subscriptions locally. Either through SharedPreferences or an SQLiteDatabase, or another preferred method.

    When the Alerts module is first installed (either a fresh install, or first time running with Alerts module) a call is made to register the device for push alerts and after a successful registration a call is made to un-subscribe from all subscriptions.

        public java.lang.String getName()

        Returns:

      • isSubscribed

        public boolean isSubscribed()
        Check if the user is subscribed to this subscription. This is false when first created. Developers must use setSubscribed(boolean) to enable or disable this flag.
        Returns:
        true is returned if this subscription is subscribed to, false if not.

        Parameters:
